title: Check out the 2020-2025 Edition!
cleaned_text: Meeting 3 Registration is Now Open! [Find out more](/get-involved/meeting-3) about how you can register to attend the third meeting of the 2025 Dietary Guidelines Advisory Committee virtually on September 12-13, 2023. Check out the 2020-2025 Edition! Make Every Bite Count with the Dietary Guidelines! [Get Involved](/get-involved) [Step 3: Advisory Committee Reviews Scientific Evidence](/learn-about-process#step-3-advisory-committee-reviews-scientific-evidence) [2025 Dietary Guidelines Advisory Committee](/2025-advisory-committee) Consumer Resources Make Every Bite Count! Here's how: Key Resources About the Guidelines: Past and Present [Previous Editions](/about-dietary-guidelines/previous-editions) The Dietary Guidelines has been issued every five years since 1980. [Visit previous editions](/about-dietary-guidelines/previous-editions). [The Latest](https://www.hhs.gov/about/news/2023/01/19/members-2025-dietary-guidelines-advisory-committee-announced.html) Check out the latest [news](https://www.hhs.gov/about/news/2023/01/19/members-2025-dietary-guidelines-advisory-committee-announced.html) and information from [HHS](https://health.gov/news/202301/announcing-2025-dietary-guidelines-advisory-committee) and [USDA](https://www.usda.gov/media/blog/2023/01/19/announcing-2025-dietary-guidelines-advisory-committee) on the development of the next edition of the Dietary Guidelines for Americans.
